channel.title: Ai-Tools on Damian Galarza | Technical Partner for Startups & Fractional CTO
channel.description: Recent content in Ai-Tools on Damian Galarza | Technical Partner for Startups & Fractional CTO

item.title: Build Efficient MCP Servers: Three Design Principles
item.description: Learn how to build Model Context Protocol servers that are 90%+ more efficient through strategic filtering and pre-aggregation. Real YNAB example shows reductions from 746,800 tokens to 262 tokens with measured optimization techniques and code examples.
